showerReviews.reviewText: We love coming here! The park is well kept, the staff are all great, and the sites are large and level. My only complaint it the men‚Äôs shower on the E loop. It‚Äôs push button and the water only runs for 3 seconds at a time.

‚Ä¶ once you enter the park, you'd never know you were so close to civilization.  The park is very nice with modern hookups and nice bath/shower facilities.  Spaces are very nicely laid out with lots of room between campers.  Roads are paved ‚Ä¶

Easy online booking. Beautiful park. We booked A15 for the night. Pull through right on the water. Definitely recommend. Will return for future stays. I can‚Äôt comment on bathroom/shower houses as we are self contained and did not use them.

Nice park. Sites very roomy with lots of shade. No sewer hookup. 2 restrooms were near our site , however, 1 of them had no temperature control for showers and only hot water came out. Neither one had any ac and it was in the 90‚Äôs so ‚Ä¶
Welcoming, and well kept park. Clean restrooms and a shower area for campers.

‚Ä¶ is very level. Only 30 amp. No sewer.  City water that tastes very good. Shower house is walking distance and private.  I would recommend Shower shoes be worn. We are right on the river with a beautiful view. Lots of space between ‚Ä¶
Large areas for each RV/tent. Well maintained grounds, roads, and facilities. Clean shower block. Dog friendly. Just a nice place to spend some time in general.

‚Ä¶ , almost all are full, but it's still quiet.  Bathhouses are interesting in area A-just two for each gender which are open concept-a toilet, sink and shower all in one room with a door to lock.  Despite how full the park is, we have not had ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ .  Beautiful giant trees throughout.  Paved walking trails..  The campground was well maintained and clean and quiet.  Lots of space between campsites.  Only con is that the shower rooms were industrial feeling and could use some updating.

Nice park. Very quiet. Good location on the water. Locking bath/shower rooms and very clean. No curfew to lock gates. I would definitely go again. Close to Pinnacle Mountain with lots of trails from easy to tough at the summit. Oh! And love ‚Ä¶

The park itself was delightful... Quiet, pretty, well maintained, easy to find, and not too remote. However, there were no pull-thrus. Shower was great.

What I don't understand about this Park is, why do so many non-campers take showers there. I have no desire to come back because of that reason
Other than that, I have no complaints, but the shower thing will keep me away.
Love this place. Few improvements needed. Shower/bathroom too hot needs more venting. And water pressure  too low.
